json.schema:
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="bfdDisabledOnResources">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="bfdForStaticRoutesDisabledOnResources">
<prop type="array" name="ipv4ListenRangePrefixes">
<prop type="array" name="ipv4NeighborAddress" identifiers="address">
<prop type="array" name="ipv6ListenRangePrefixes">
<prop type="array" name="ipv6NeighborAddress" identifiers="address">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="bgpDisabledOnResources">
<prop type="array" name="connectedIPv4Subnets" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="connectedIPv6Subnets" identifiers="prefix">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="disabledOnResources">
<prop type="array" name="ipv4Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="nextHop" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="ipv6Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="nextHop" required="True">

command.name: create
command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$body.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv4ListenRangePrefixes" options="ipv4-listen-range-prefixes" group="">
<arg type="array" var="$body.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv4NeighborAddress" options="ipv4-neighbor-address" group="">
<arg type="array" var="$body.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv6ListenRangePrefixes" options="ipv6-listen-range-prefixes">
<arg type="array" var="$body.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv6NeighborAddress" options="ipv6-neighbor-address" group="">
<arg type="array" var="$body.properties.connectedIPv4Subnets" options="connected-ipv4-subnets" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$body.properties.connectedIPv6Subnets" options="connected-ipv6-subnets" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$body.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv4Routes" options="ipv4-routes" group="">
<arg type="array" var="$body.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv4Routes[].nextHop" options="next-hop" required="True" group="">
<arg type="array" var="$body.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv6Routes" options="ipv6-routes" group="">
<arg type="array" var="$body.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv6Routes[].nextHop" options="next-hop" required="True" group="">

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="ipv4ListenRangePrefixes" arg="$body.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv4ListenRangePrefixes">
<prop type="array" name="ipv4NeighborAddress" arg="$body.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv4NeighborAddress" identifiers="address">

<prop type="array" name="ipv6NeighborAddress" arg="$body.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv6NeighborAddress" identifiers="address">

<prop type="array" name="connectedIPv6Subnets" arg="$body.properties.connectedIPv6Subnets" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="ipv4Routes" arg="$body.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv4Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="nextHop" arg="$body.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv4Routes[].nextHop" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="ipv6Routes" arg="$body.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv6Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="nextHop" arg="$body.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv6Routes[].nextHop" required="True">

<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="bfdDisabledOnResources">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="bfdForStaticRoutesDisabledOnResources">

<prop type="array" name="ipv4NeighborAddress" identifiers="address">
<prop type="array" name="ipv6ListenRangePrefixes">
<prop type="array" name="ipv6NeighborAddress" identifiers="address">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="bgpDisabledOnResources">
<prop type="array" name="connectedIPv4Subnets" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="connectedIPv6Subnets" identifiers="prefix">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="disabledOnResources">
<prop type="array" name="ipv4Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="nextHop" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="ipv6Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="nextHop" required="True">

command.name: update
command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$body.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv4ListenRangePrefixes" options="ipv4-listen-range-prefixes" group="">
<arg type="array" var="$body.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv4NeighborAddress" options="ipv4-neighbor-address" group="">
